free/unrestrained/to inundate

sentences.english: The car caused a cloud of dust as it went down the dirt road.
sentences.chinese: 小车沿着布满灰土公路飞驰，扬起了漫天灰尘。

sentences.english: That seaside hotel charges exorbitant prices during the summer holidays.
sentences.chinese: 那家海滨旅馆在夏天休假期间漫天要价。

sentences.english: They tried to overcharge me, but I didn't agree.
sentences.chinese: 他们企图向我漫天要价，但我没同意。

sentences.english: Have dish eldest brother now Xuan sky five extremely cover with one ax shadow to slaughter an moth tribe.
sentences.chinese: 今有盘老大玄天五绝漫天斧影屠戮虫族。

sentences.english: I am not eating luxurious dishes without nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 我不吃没有营养又漫天要价的那些垃圾食品。

sentences.english: The night empty , take a distant view interstellar to cover with, look for each other of fixed position.
sentences.chinese: 夜朗空晴时，遥望星际漫天，寻觅彼此的定位。

sentences.english: I look upto the sky, when the milky accompany me the ball.
sentences.chinese: 抬头仰望着漫天星河，那时候陪伴我的那颗。

sentences.english: Art thesis on mood, earth and force.
sentences.chinese: 荒谬艺术之怪论，漫天乱谈情土力。

sentences.english: The glowworms light the stars all over the sky in the night without moon.
sentences.chinese: 没有月色的夜里，萤火虫用心点亮漫天的星。

sentences.english: The heavy snow soaks my dress.
Some vendors hoodwink outside tourists by charging them exorbitant prices.
sentences.chinese: 有的小贩漫天要价，坑骗外地游客。

sentences.english: So leisurely, she danced all over the sky.
sentences.chinese: 那么的闲逸，她，漫天飞舞。

sentences.english: You are seeing cinders dancing in the updraft.
sentences.chinese: 你还看到漫天飞舞的火灰在扶摇直上。

sentences.english: They priced themselves out of the world market.
sentences.chinese: 他们由于漫天要价而把自己赶出了世界市场。

sentences.english: The night sky was reddened by the sweeping fire.
sentences.chinese: 漫天的大火把夜空映了个通红。

sentences.english: It was snowing heavily, Jenny and I were walking on the icy road towards school.
sentences.chinese: 大雪漫天，我和珍妮行走在去学校的路上。

to whistle/to scream/to whiz

lit. to fill the whole sky and cover the land; everywhere/as far as the eye can see
gale/squall/whole gale (meteorology)
